paper_abstract: The class of very simple grammars is known to be polynomial-time identifiable in the limit from positive data. This paper gives an even more general discussion on the efficiency of identification of very simple grammars from positive data, which includes both positive and negative results. In particular, we present an alternative efficient inconsistent learning algorithm for very simple grammars. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Learning efficiency of very simple grammars from positive data
